verbs.description: [V: trump] [ARG1: administration] considering rollback of transgender protections the trump administration is considering a possible rollback of obama - era recognitions and protections that broadened the definition of gender according to a report sunday hhs federal district court office of civil rights judge reed o’connor washington new york times transgender united states district court united states department of health and human services
